fields.name: ElasticScaleEnabled
fields.description: ServerFarm supports ElasticScale. Apps in this plan will scale as if the ServerFarm was ElasticPremium sku

fields.name: FreeOfferExpirationTime
fields.description: The time when the server farm free offer expires.

fields.name: GeoRegion
fields.description: Geographical location for the App Service plan.

fields.name: HostingEnvironmentProfile
fields.description: Specification for the App Service Environment to use for the App Service plan.

fields.name: HyperV
fields.description: If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise.

fields.name: IsSpot
fields.description: If true, this App Service Plan owns spot instances.

fields.name: IsXenon
fields.description: Obsolete: If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise.

fields.name: KubeEnvironmentProfile
fields.description: Specification for the Kubernetes Environment to use for the App Service plan.

fields.name: MaximumElasticWorkerCount
fields.description: Maximum number of total workers allowed for this ElasticScaleEnabled App Service Plan

fields.name: MaximumNumberOfWorkers
fields.description: Maximum number of instances that can be assigned to this App Service plan.

fields.name: NumberOfSites
fields.description: Number of apps assigned to this App Service plan.

fields.name: NumberOfWorkers
fields.description: The number of instances that are assigned to this App Service plan.

fields.name: PerSiteScaling
fields.description: If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently. If false, apps assigned to this App Service plan will scale to all instances of the plan.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the App Service Plan.

fields.name: Reserved
fields.description: If Linux app service plan true, false otherwise.

fields.name: ResourceGroup
fields.description: Resource group of the App Service plan.

fields.name: SpotExpirationTime
fields.description: The time when the server farm expires. Valid only if it is a spot server farm.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: App Service plan status.

fields.name: Subscription
fields.description: App Service plan subscription.

fields.name: TargetWorkerCount
fields.description: Scaling worker count.

fields.name: TargetWorkerSizeId
fields.description: Scaling worker size ID.

fields.name: WorkerTierName
fields.description: Target worker tier assigned to the App Service plan.

fields.name: ZoneRedundant
fields.description: If true, this App Service Plan will perform availability zone balancing. If false, this App Service Plan will not perform availability zone balancing.
